languages.text: {n}Друкари презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Опору, Азуриани? Опора нужна для тех, кто ищет самообмана в ложных ограничениях. До тех пор, пока у меня будут в достатке жертвы, я не дам Сай'лантреш овладеть мной".

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Опору, Азурьяни? Опора нужна для тех, кто ищет самообмана в ложных ограничениях. До тех пор, пока у меня будут в достатке жертвы, я не дам Сай'лантреш овладеть мной".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "An anchor, Asuryani? That is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Опору, Азуриани? Опора нужна для тех, кто ищет самообмана в ложных ограничениях. До тех пор, пока у меня будут в достатке жертвы, я не дам Сай'лантреш овладеть мной".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "My 'support,' Asuryani? 'Support' is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "My 'support,' Asuryani? 'Support' is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "An anchor, Asuryani? That is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "An anchor, Asuryani? That is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'esclaffe.{/n} « Une bouée de sauvetage, Asuryani ? C'est le genre d'artifices qu'affectionnent ceux qui se conforment à des limites arbitraires et se bercent d'illusions. Tant que je dispose d'un afflux suffisant de victimes, Sai'lanthresh ne pourra pas s'emparer de moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "An anchor, Asuryani? That is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai s'esclaffe.{/n} « Une bouée de sauvetage, Asuryani ? C'est le genre d'artifices qu'affectionnent ceux qui se conforment à des limites arbitraires et se bercent d'illusions. Tant que je dispose d'un afflux suffisant de victimes, Sai'lanthresh ne pourra pas s'emparer de moi. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが嘲笑する。{/n}「アンカーだと、アシュリヤーニ？それは自分を偽りの限界で欺こうとする者のためのものだ。犠牲者がたくさんいる限り、俺はセランスレッシュの手に落ちたりなどしない」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "An anchor, Asuryani? That is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが嘲笑する。{/n}「アンカーだと、アシュリヤーニ？それは自分を偽りの限界で欺こうとする者のためのものだ。犠牲者がたくさんいる限り、俺はセランスレッシュの手に落ちたりなどしない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋哼了一声。{/n}“你是说什么‘锚点’吗，方舟灵族？这不过是自欺欺人的小伎俩，用来限制自己的力量罢了。只要我得到了足够多的猎物，赛·兰斯雷什就别想带走我。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "An anchor, Asuryani? That is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋哼了一声。{/n}“你是说什么‘锚点’吗，方舟灵族？这不过是自欺欺人的小伎俩，用来限制自己的力量罢了。只要我得到了足够多的猎物，赛·兰斯雷什就别想带走我。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schnaubt auf.{/n} "Ein Anker, Asuryani? Das ist etwas für jene, die glauben, Beschränkungen zu unterliegen. So lange ich einen ausreichenden Vorrat an Opfern habe, lasse ich mich nicht von Sai'lanthresh holen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "An anchor, Asuryani? That is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schnaubt auf.{/n} "Ein Anker, Asuryani? Das ist etwas für jene, die glauben, Beschränkungen zu unterliegen. So lange ich einen ausreichenden Vorrat an Opfern habe, lasse ich mich nicht von Sai'lanthresh holen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se burla.{/n} «Un ancla, Asuryani? Eso es para quienes se engañan a sí mismos con falsas limitaciones. Mientras tenga víctimas en abundancia, no permitiré que Sai'lanthresh me lleve».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "An anchor, Asuryani? That is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se burla.{/n} «Un ancla, Asuryani? Eso es para quienes se engañan a sí mismos con falsas limitaciones. Mientras tenga víctimas en abundancia, no permitiré que Sai'lanthresh me lleve».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai dudak büküyor.{/n} "Tutunacak dal mı Asuryani? Dallar, keyfi sınırlarla kendilerini kandıranlar içindir. Çokça kurban sunabildiğim sürece Sai'lanthresh beni ele geçiremez."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai scoffs.{/n} "An anchor, Asuryani? That is for those who seek to delude themselves with false limitations. As long as I have victims in plentiful supply, I won't let Sai'lanthresh claim me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai dudak büküyor.{/n} "Bir destek mi Asuryani? Onlar, kendilerini sahte sınırlılıklarla kandırmaya çalışanlar içindir. Kurbanlarımın sayısı bol olduğu sürece Sai'lanthresh'in beni ele geçirmesine izin vermem."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
